entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
